summary: THE HEAD RESTRAINT ANGLE IS TOO FAR FORWARD; IT PUSHES MY HEAD FORWARD PUTTING STRESS ON MY NECK.  MY UPPER BACK AND SHOULDERS CANNOT CONTACT THE SEAT DUE TO THE HEAD RESTRAINT ANGLE, REGARDLESS OF THE HEIGHT OF THE HEAD RESTRAINT.  IN EFFECT, MY NECK IS SUPPORTING MY UPPER BODY SINCE MY UPPER BACK AND SHOULDERS DON'T TOUCH THE SEAT.  THIS HAS BEEN CAUSING PAIN IN MY NECK AND UPPER BACK.  *TR
